tool_description: Ensures review request campaigns comply with regulations, customer preferences, and opt-out requirements before sending messages.

customer_ids.description: List of customer IDs to check compliance for

message_channels.description: Communication channels to be used: email, sms, push

regulation_regions.description: Geographic regions for compliance: GDPR, CCPA, CAN_SPAM, TCPA, CASL

check_opt_outs.description: Whether to check customer opt-out preferences

check_frequency_limits.description: Whether to enforce message frequency limits

max_messages_per_month.description: Maximum messages allowed per customer per month

error_messages: Empty customer list: customer_ids array cannot be empty.
Invalid message channels: Use valid channels from [email, sms, push].
Invalid regulation region: Use valid regions from [GDPR, CCPA, CAN_SPAM, TCPA, CASL].
Compliance database unavailable: Unable to access customer preference and compliance data.
Invalid frequency limit: max_messages_per_month must be between 1 and 30.
usage: Check customer compliance status before sending review requests by providing customer IDs, channels, and applicable regulations. The tool filters compliant customers.

compliant_customers.description: List of customer IDs that passed all compliance checks

non_compliant_customers.description: List of customer IDs that failed compliance checks

compliance_issues.description: Specific compliance issues found for non-compliant customers

compliance_rate.description: Percentage of customers that passed compliance checks
